description: LivaNova helical coil cuff electrode with 3 mm resting inner diameter, 100 um thickness between cuff and nerve, bipolar, the cuffs are contained in the same fill domain, used clinically for epilepsy

params.name: rev_BD_insul_LN
params.description: revolution of the insulation before deformation (i.e., at rest as manufactured)

params.name: r_cuff_in_pre_LN
params.description: cuff radius before deformation (i.e., at rest as manufactured)

params.name: r_cuff_in_LN
params.description: cuff radius after deformation to accommodate nerve and fill domains

params.name: insul_arc_length_LN
params.description: arc length of the insulation

params.name: helix_pitch_LN
params.description: distance between consecutive turns of the insulation (center-to-center or edge-to-edge)

params.name: thk_cuff_LN
params.description: radial thickness of the cuff

params.name: rev_PD_insul_LN
params.description: revolution of the insulation after deformation (i.e., after deformation to accommodate nerve and fill domains)

params.name: L_cuff_LN_BD
params.description: length of the insulation before deformation (i.e., at rest as manufactured)

params.name: L_cuff_LN_PD
params.description: length of the insulation after deformation (i.e., after deformation to accommodate nerve and fill domains)

params.name: w_cuff_LN
params.description: width of the cuff cross-section (rectangle if you were to cuff it, this is along the length of the nerve)

params.name: thk_elec_LN
params.description: electrode thickness (radial direction), note that conductor = contact

params.name: rev_PD_cond_LN
params.description: revolutions of the conductor after deformation (i.e., after deformation to accommodate nerve and fill domains), note that conductor = contact

params.name: rev_BD_cond_LN
params.description: revolution of the conductor before deformation (i.e., at rest as manufactured), note that conductor = contact

params.name: cond_arc_length_LN
params.description: conductor arc length before deformation (i.e., at rest as manufactured), note that conductor = contact

params.name: recess_LN
params.description: amount that contact is recessed into the cuff

params.name: w_elec_LN
params.description: electrode width (along direction of nerve), note that conductor = contact

params.name: corr_LN
params.description: rotation correction for the cuff from deformation

params.name: thk_medium_gap_internal_LN
params.description: thickness of the medium gap of fill between the cuff and the nerve

params.name: Thk_fill_LN
params.description: thickness of the fill between the cuff and the nerve

params.name: sep_elec_LN
params.description: center-to-center separation between electrodes
